availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: R. R. Bacon (Franklin County, Kentucky, clerk and captain state guard (U.S.A.))

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, clerk and soldier. Clerk in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1863. Clerk in Franklin County in 1864. Served in the State Guard (U.S.A.) as a captain from December 11, 1864, to December 20, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Annual Report of the Auditor of Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863, Legislative Documents Series, No. 10 (Frankfort, KY: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 301.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 901.
KYR-0001-004-0497.
